sentences.sentence: The patho-physiological mechanisms of the clinical manifestations were discussed from the cerebral hemodynamic point of view.
sentences.translation: 从脑血流动力学的角度探讨了临床表现的病理生理机制。

sentences.sentence: Perfusion CT techniques can be used to evaluate the hemodynamic changes of the liver.
sentences.translation: CT灌注成像技术可以用来评价肝脏的血流动力学变化。

sentences.sentence: Intensive medical therapy resulted in improvement in both hemodynamic measurements and IAP.
sentences.translation: 加强治疗使得血流动力学和腹内压同时改善。
